definitions.title: n. m.
definitions.body: :Ps 65:10 (cleft) channel, (artif.) canal;—usu. pl. [[פְּלָנִים]] Is 30:25 ( + [[יִבְלֵי־מָָיִם]]); cstr. [[פַּלְגֵי־מַיִם]] Ps 1:3, sim. Is 32:2, Pr 21:1, metaph. Pr 5:16, of tears La 3:48, Ps 119:136; [[פְּלָגׇיו]] Ps 46:5 (i.e. irrigating canals fr. river, metaph.); [[פַּלְגֵי־שָָׁמֶן]] Job 29:6 (fig. of prosperity); sg. [[פֶּלֶג אֱלֽהִים]] Ps 65:10, poet. of channel for rain (cf. Job 38:25).
